enrichments.extra_info: Austria: Winter tires required Nov 1-Apr 15 (vehicles >3.5t year-round), 4mm tread minimum, M+S or Alpine snowflake symbol. Chains required where signed (blue sign). Fines up to ‚Ç¨5,000. Switzerland: No blanket winter tire requirement but must be equipped appropriately. Chains required where 'Ketten obligatorisch' signed. Italy: Requirements vary by province. Alps/Dolomites often require winter tires/chains Nov 15-Apr 15. Aosta Valley: Oct 15-Apr 15 mandatory. Tread depth 3.5mm minimum. 2WD motorhomes need 2 chains (drive wheels). 4WD motorhomes need 2 chains (front wheels only). Practice installation in pleasant weather - extremely difficult in freezing conditions with bare hands.
